Html:
I am trying to get the MHRA footnote working with Microsoft Office 2013. I have downloaded the styles.zip folder and extracted the files from within it and copied these files (including the MHRAFootNote.XSL) into the %userprofile%\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Bibliography\Style folder.

When opening Microsoft Word I can now see all of the styles from the style.zip folder except for the MHRA one. Does anyone know how to resolve this?

I have tried the same steps for Office 2010 (by copying into %programfiles%\Microsoft Office\Office14\Bibliography\Style) and this works fine. So seems to be an issue with Office 2013?
I have the exact same problem and I am using word 2013. All the other styles from the package work perfectly, annoyingly the only one I want is the only one that does not come up
I also have this issue - it is very frustrating as I can't find any other way of producing footnote style references! Does anyone have a solution for this?
